messages.subject: Quiet Weekend
messages.msgSnippet: I just wanted to give everyone the heads up that this is a conference weekend and traffic might be dramatically slowed! If a question is posted, there might
messages.messageBody:
I just wanted to give everyone the heads up that this is a conference
weekend and traffic might be dramatically slowed!
If a question is posted, there might not be a flurry of answers until next
week Tuesday (or later, depending on travels!). Please be patient, we're
really busy being immersed in Unschoolers :D
I'm available via cellphone/text 605.201.9863 & I'll be Twittering all day,
every day (if you don't wanna sign up, you can read my updates on
hahamommy.blogspot.com - there's a feed in the side bar!)
If you're at LIFE is Good, come by and say hello!
(I'll be no mail til Tuesday)
~diana :)
xoxoxoxo
hannahbearski.blogspot.com
hannahsashes.blogspot.com
dianas365.blogspot.com
